TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit CompareInfo extends System.Object implements class System.Runtime.Serialization.IDeserializationCallback

summary.span: 实现用于区分区域性的字符串的一组方法。

span.span: Implements a set of methods for culture-sensitive string comparisons.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用于比较和排序数据的约定因区域性而异。Conventions for comparing and sorting data vary from culture to culture. 例如，排序顺序可能基于拼音或基于字符的可视表示形式。For example, sort order may be based on phonetics or on the visual representation of characters. 在东亚语言中，按文字的笔画和部首对字符进行排序。In East Asian languages, characters are sorted by the stroke and radical of ideographs. 排序也取决于字母表使用的排序语言和区域性。Sorting also depends on the order languages and cultures use for the alphabet. 例如，丹麦语中有“Æ”字符，它在字母表中排在“Z”之后。For example, the Danish language has an "Æ" character that it sorts after "Z" in the alphabet. 此外，比较可以区分大小写或不区分大小写，并且大小写规则也可能因区域性而异。In addition, comparisons may be case-sensitive or case-insensitive, and casing rules may also differ by culture. 类负责维护此区分区域性的字符串比较数据并执行区分区域性的字符串运算。The class is responsible for maintaining this culture-sensitive string comparison data and for performing culture-sensitive string operations. 通常，您不必直接实例化 对象，因为所有非序号字符串比较运算会隐式使用一个此对象，包括对 方法的调用。Typically, you do not have to instantiate a object directly, because one is used implicitly by all non-ordinal string comparison operations, including calls to the method. 但是，若要检索 对象，您可通过下列方法之一执行此操作：However, if you do want to retrieve a object, you can do it in one of these ways: - 通过检索特定区域性的 属性的值。By retrieving the value of the property for a particular culture. - 通过使用区域性名称调用静态 方法。By calling the static method with a culture name. 这允许对 对象进行后期绑定访问。This allows for late-bound access to a object. ## 已忽略的搜索值Ignored search values 字符集包括可忽略字符，在执行语言性的或区分区域性的比较时该字符不被考虑。Character sets include ignorable characters, which are characters that are not considered when performing a linguistic or culture-sensitive comparison. 当比较方法（如 和 ）执行区分区域性的比较时，它们不会考虑此类字符。Comparison methods such as and do not consider such characters when they perform a culture-sensitive comparison. 可忽略的字符包括：Ignorable characters include: - 。. 区分区域性的比较方法将始终在要搜索的字符串的开头（索引为零）查找空字符串。Culture-sensitive comparison methods will always find an empty string at the beginning (index zero) of the string being searched. - 字符或由多个字符和运算中未考虑的码位（因为比较选项）构成的字符串，具体而言， 和 选项生成忽略符号和非间距组合字符的搜索。A character or string consisting of characters with code points that are not considered in the operation because of comparison options, In particular, the and options produce searches in which symbols and nonspacing combining characters are ignored. - 带没有语义的码位的字符串。A string with code points that have no linguistic significance. 例如，始终在区分区域性的字符串比较中忽略软连字符 (U+00AD)。For example, a soft hyphen (U+00AD) is always ignored in a culture-sensitive string comparison. ## 安全注意事项Security considerations 如果安全决策取决于字符串比较或大小写更改，则您应使用 属性来确保行为一致，无论操作系统的区域性设置如何。If a security decision depends on a string comparison or a case change, you should use the property to ensure that the behavior is consistent, regardless of the culture settings of the operating system. > [!NOTE] > 如果可能，应使用具有类型参数的字符串比较方法可以指定比较预期的类型。When possible, you should use string comparison methods that have a parameter of type to specify the kind of comparison expected. 作为一般规则，用来进行比较的用户界面中显示的字符串 （使用当前区域性） 的语言选项并指定或安全比较。As a general rule, use linguistic options (using the current culture) for comparing strings displayed in the user interface and specify or for security comparisons. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何与关联的对象对象会影响字符串比较。The following example shows how the object associated with a object affects string comparison. [!code-cpp[CompareInfo#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CompareInfo/cpp/CompareInfo.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[CompareInfo#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CompareInfo/CS/CompareInfo.cs#1)] [!code-vb[CompareInfo#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/CompareInfo/VB/CompareInfo.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，通过执行比较。By default, the comparison is performed by using . 如果安全决策取决于字符串比较或大小写更改，则应使用属性来确保行为一致无论操作系统的区域性设置如何。If a security decision depends on a string comparison or a case change, you should use the property to ensure that the behavior is consistent regardless of the culture settings of the operating system. > [!NOTE] > 如果可能，你应调用字符串比较方法具有类型参数的可以指定比较预期的类型。When possible, you should call string comparison methods that have a parameter of type to specify the kind of comparison expected. 作为一般规则，用来进行比较的用户界面中显示的字符串 （使用当前区域性） 的语言选项并指定或安全比较。As a general rule, use linguistic options (using the current culture) for comparing strings displayed in the user interface and specify or for security comparisons. ## Examples 下面的示例比较使用不同的两个字符串的部分对象：The following example compares portions of two strings using the different objects: - 与使用国际排序西班牙语 （西班牙） 区域性关联的对象 object associated with the Spanish (Spain) culture with international sort - 与使用传统的排序的西班牙语 （西班牙） 区域性关联的对象 object associated with the Spanish (Spain) culture with traditional sort - 与关联的对象 object associated with the [!code-cpp[System.Globalization.CompareInfo.CompareStrStr#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.CompareInfo.CompareStrStr/CPP/comparestrstr.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.CompareInfo.CompareStrStr#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.CompareInfo.CompareStrStr/CS/comparestrstr.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.CompareInfo.CompareStrStr#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.CompareInfo.CompareStrStr/VB/comparestrstr.vb#1)] 下面的示例演示如何调用 方法。The following example demonstrates calling the method. [!code-cpp[CompareInfo#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CompareInfo/cpp/CompareInfo.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[CompareInfo#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CompareInfo/CS/CompareInfo.cs#1)] [!code-vb[CompareInfo#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/CompareInfo/VB/CompareInfo.vb#1)]

字符集包括可忽略字符，在执行语言性的或区分区域性的比较时该字符不被考虑。Character sets include ignorable characters, which are characters that are not considered when performing a linguistic or culture-sensitive comparison. 方法执行区分区域性的比较时不考虑此类字符。The method does not consider such characters when it performs a culture-sensitive comparison. 例如，"动物"与"ani 邮件"（使用软连字符或 U + 00AD） 区分区域性的比较该值指示两个字符串相等，如以下示例所示。For instance, a culture-sensitive comparison of "animal" with "ani-mal" (using a soft hyphen, or U+00AD) indicates that the two strings are equivalent, as the following example shows.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 行为依赖于其实现中，这可能会改变一个版本的公共语言运行时到另一个，或从一个.NET Framework 平台到另一个。The behavior of is dependent on its implementation, which might change from one version of the common language runtime to another, or from one .NET Framework platform to another. > [!IMPORTANT] > 如果两个字符串对象是否相等，方法返回相同的值。If two string objects are equal, the method returns identical values. 但是，有不为每个唯一字符串值是唯一的哈希代码值。However, there is not a unique hash code value for each unique string value. 不同的字符串可以返回相同的哈希代码。Different strings can return the same hash code. > > 哈希代码本身不被保证保持不变。The hash code itself is not guaranteed to be stable. 跨版本的.NET Framework 和跨平台 （例如 32 位和 64 位） 的单个版本的.NET framework，可以与不同相同字符串的哈希代码。Hash codes for identical strings can differ across versions of the .NET Framework and across platforms (such as 32-bit and 64-bit) for a single version of the .NET Framework. 在某些情况下，它们可以甚至不同由应用程序域。In some cases, they can even differ by application domain. > > 因此，哈希代码应永远不会使用在其中创建了它们，应用程序域之外客户应永远不会使用作为集合中的键字段，并应永远不会保留它们。As a result, hash codes should never be used outside of the application domain in which they were created, they should never be used as key fields in a collection, and they should never be persisted.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 字符串中的每个字符都赋予若干类排序权重，包括脚本，字母、 大小写和变音符权重。Each character in a string is given several categories of sort weights, including script, alphabetic, case, and diacritic weights. 排序关键字是特定字符串这些权重的库。A sort key is the repository of these weights for a particular string. 例如，排序键可能包含字母权重，后面是一个字符串的大小写的权重和等等的字符串。For example, a sort key might contain a string of alphabetic weights, followed by a string of case weights, and so on. 方法相当于的 Windows API 方法`LCMapString`LCMAP_SORTKEY 标志。The method is equivalent to the Windows API method `LCMapString` with the LCMAP_SORTKEY flag.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法搜索字符串的末尾的源字符串从该字符串的开头。This method searches the source string from the beginning of the string to the end of the string. 此重载执行区分区域性的搜索。This overload performs a culture-sensitive search. 如果`value`表示一个复合的 Unicode 字符，例如连字"Æ"(U + 00 C 6)，它可能被视为等效于其组件在正确的顺序，如"遍历"中的任何匹配项 (U + 0041、 U + 0045)，则根据区域性。If `value` represents a precomposed Unicode character, such as the ligature "Æ" (U+00C6), it might be considered equivalent to any occurrence of its components in the correct sequence, such as "AE" (U+0041, U+0045), depending on the culture. 若要执行序号 （不区分区域性的） 搜索，其中一个字符被视为等效于另一个字符只当其 Unicode 码位都相同的则应调用重载，具有类型参数并用值。To perform an ordinal (culture-insensitive) search, where a character is considered equivalent to another character only if their Unicode code points are the same, you should call an overload that has a parameter of type and use the value. 与不同，这将执行区分区域性的比较，重载的搜索字符执行序号比较，并搜索字符串的重载执行区分区域性的比较的方法。Unlike , which performs a culture-sensitive comparison, overloads of the method that search for a character perform an ordinal comparison and overloads that search for a string perform a culture-sensitive comparison. > [!NOTE] > 如果可能，应使用具有类型参数的字符串比较方法可以指定比较预期的类型。When possible, you should use string comparison methods that have a parameter of type to specify the kind of comparison expected. 作为一般规则，用来进行比较的用户界面中显示的字符串 （使用当前区域性） 的语言选项并指定或安全比较。As a general rule, use linguistic options (using the current culture) for comparing strings displayed in the user interface and specify or for security comparisons. ## Examples 下面的示例确定一个字符或字符串内的子字符串的第一个和最后一个匹配项的索引。The following example determines the indexes of the first and last occurrences of a character or a substring within a string. remarks.format: ## Remarks 在源字符串搜索，在开始向前`startIndex`在字符串末尾结束。The source string is searched forward starting at `startIndex` and ending at the end of the string. 值不是此方法有效。The value is not valid for this method. 如果`options`不包括值，此重载执行区分区域性的搜索。If `options` does not include the value, this overload performs a culture-sensitive search. 表示一个复合的字符，例如连字"Æ"(U + 00 C 6) 的 Unicode 值可能被视为等效于任何形式的字符中的组件正确的顺序，如"遍历"(U + 0041、 U + 0045)，则根据区域性。A Unicode value representing a precomposed character, such as the ligature "Æ" (U+00C6), might be considered equivalent to any occurrence of the character's components in the correct sequence, such as "AE" (U+0041, U+0045), depending on the culture. 如果`options`包括值，此重载执行序号 （不区分区域性的） 搜索，其中的 Unicode 值进行比较。If `options` includes the value, this overload performs an ordinal (culture-insensitive) search, where the Unicode values are compared. > [!NOTE] > 如果可能，你应调用字符串比较方法具有类型参数的可以指定比较预期的类型。When possible, you should call string comparison methods that have a parameter of type to specify the kind of comparison expected. 作为一般规则，用来进行比较的用户界面中显示的字符串 （使用当前区域性） 的语言选项并指定或安全比较。As a general rule, use linguistic options (using the current culture) for comparing strings displayed in the user interface and specify or for security comparisons. ## Examples 下面的示例确定一个字符或字符串的一部分内的子字符串的第一个和最后一个匹配项的索引。The following example determines the indexes of the first and last occurrences of a character or a substring within a portion of a string. 请注意，和要搜索的字符串，即使使用相同的不同部分`startIndex`参数。Note that and are searching in different portions of the string, even with the same `startIndex` parameter. [!code-cpp[System.Globalization.CompareInfo.IndexOfInt#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.CompareInfo.IndexOfInt/CPP/indexofint.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.CompareInfo.IndexOfInt#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.CompareInfo.IndexOfInt/CS/indexofint.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.CompareInfo.IndexOfInt#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.CompareInfo.IndexOfInt/VB/indexofint.vb#1)]

block.para:
字符集包括可忽略字符，在执行语言性的或区分区域性的排序时不被考虑的字符。Character sets include ignorable characters, which are characters that are not considered when performing a linguistic or culture-sensitive sort. 在区分区域性的搜索 (即，如果 不是 或 ) 中，如果 包含一个可忽略字符，则结果与移除了该字符的搜索等效。In a culture-sensitive search (that is, if is not or ), if contains an ignorable character, the result is equivalent to searching with that character removed. 如果仅由一个或多个可忽略字符，组成方法始终返回，即开始执行搜索的字符位置。If consists only of one or more ignorable characters, the method always returns , which is the character position at which the search begins.
在下面的示例中，方法用于查找软连字符 (U + 00AD) 后跟"m"从两个字符串中的第三个字符位置开始的位置。In the following example, the method is used to find the position of a soft hyphen (U+00AD) followed by an "m" starting with the third character position in two strings. 只有一个字符串包含必需的子字符串。Only one of the strings contains the required substring. 在这两种情况下，因为软连字符是可忽略字符，因此，在执行区分区域性的比较时，该方法在字符串中返回索引“m”。In both cases, because the soft hyphen is an ignorable character, the method returns the index of "m" in the string when it performs a culture-sensitive comparison. 注意对于第一个字符串，包含软连字符后跟“m”，该方法无法返回该软连字符的索引，而是返回“m”的索引。Note that in the case of the first string, which includes the soft hyphen followed by an "m", the method fails to return the index of the soft hyphen but instead returns the index of the "m". 只有当此方法执行序号比较时，它才会在第一个字符串中返回软连字符的索引。The method returns the index of the soft hyphen in the first string only when it performs an ordinal comparison.
[!code-csharp[System.Globalization.CompareInfo.IndexOf#15](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.CompareInfo.IndexOf/CS/ignorable14.cs#15)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.CompareInfo.IndexOf#15](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.CompareInfo.IndexOf/VB/ignorable14.vb#15)]

字符集包括可忽略字符，在执行语言性的或区分区域性的排序时不被考虑的字符。Character sets include ignorable characters, which are characters that are not considered when performing a linguistic or culture-sensitive sort. 在区分区域性的搜索中，如果是可忽略字符，结果等效于搜索移除了该字符。In a culture-sensitive search, if is an ignorable character, the result is equivalent to searching with that character removed. 在这种情况下，方法始终返回，即在其中搜索第一次出现的字符位置。In this case, the method always returns , which is the character position at which the search first began. 在下面的示例中，方法用于在两个字符串中后"n"查找软连字符 (U + 00AD)。In the following example, the method is used to find the soft hyphen (U+00AD) after an "n" in two strings. 只有一个字符串包含软连字符。Only one of the strings contains a soft hyphen. 在这两种情况下，因为软连字符是一个可忽略字符，区分区域性的搜索将返回 1，表示它已找到匹配项中的"n"的位置。In both cases, because the soft hyphen is an ignorable character, a culture-sensitive search returns 1 to indicate that it has found a match at the position of the "n". 序号搜索，但是，已成功在一个字符串中查找软连字符，并报告其不存在从第二个字符串。An ordinal search, however, successfully finds the soft hyphen in one string and reports that it is absent from the second string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在源字符串搜索，在开始向前`startIndex`结束`startIndex` + `count` -1。The source string is searched forward starting at `startIndex` and ending at `startIndex` + `count` - 1. 值不是此方法有效。The value is not valid for this method. 如果`options`不包括值，此重载执行区分区域性的搜索。If `options` does not include the value, this overload performs a culture-sensitive search. 表示一个复合的字符，例如连字"Æ"(U + 00 C 6) 的 Unicode 值可能被视为等效于任何形式的字符中的组件正确的顺序，如"遍历"(U + 0041、 U + 0045)，则根据区域性。A Unicode value representing a precomposed character, such as the ligature "Æ" (U+00C6), might be considered equivalent to any occurrence of the character's components in the correct sequence, such as "AE" (U+0041, U+0045), depending on the culture. 如果`options`包括值，此重载执行序号 （不区分区域性的） 搜索，其中的 Unicode 值进行比较。If `options` includes the value, this overload performs an ordinal (culture-insensitive) search, where the Unicode values are compared. > [!NOTE] > 如果可能，你应调用字符串比较方法具有类型参数的可以指定比较预期的类型。When possible, you should call string comparison methods that have a parameter of type to specify the kind of comparison expected. 作为一般规则，用来进行比较的用户界面中显示的字符串 （使用当前区域性） 的语言选项并指定或安全比较。As a general rule, use linguistic options (using the current culture) for comparing strings displayed in the user interface and specify or for security comparisons. ## Examples 下面的示例确定一个字符或字符串的一部分内的子字符串的第一个和最后一个匹配项的索引。The following example determines the indexes of the first and last occurrences of a character or a substring within a portion of a string. block.para:
字符集包括可忽略字符，在执行语言性的或区分区域性的排序时不被考虑的字符。Character sets include ignorable characters, which are characters that are not considered when performing a linguistic or culture-sensitive sort. 在区分区域性的搜索 (即，如果 不是 或 ) 中，如果 包含一个可忽略字符，则结果与移除了该字符的搜索等效。In a culture-sensitive search (that is, if is not or ), if contains an ignorable character, the result is equivalent to searching with that character removed. 如果仅由一个或多个可忽略字符，组成方法始终返回，即开始执行搜索的字符位置。If consists only of one or more ignorable characters, the method always returns , which is the character position at which the search begins.
在下面的示例中，方法用于查找软连字符 (U + 00AD) 后跟"m"中第三到两个字符串中的第六个字符位置开始的位置。In the following example, the method is used to find the position of a soft hyphen (U+00AD) followed by an "m" starting in the third through sixth character positions in two strings. 只有一个字符串包含必需的子字符串。Only one of the strings contains the required substring. 在这两种情况下，因为软连字符是可忽略字符，因此，在执行区分区域性的比较时，该方法在字符串中返回索引“m”。In both cases, because the soft hyphen is an ignorable character, the method returns the index of "m" in the string when it performs a culture-sensitive comparison. 当它执行序号比较时，但是，它会查找子字符串仅在第一个字符串中。When it performs an ordinal comparison, however, it finds the substring only in the first string. 请注意，对于第一个字符串，包含软连字符后跟"m"，该方法无法返回该软连字符的索引，但执行区分区域性的比较时，而是返回"m"的索引。Note that in the case of the first string, which includes the soft hyphen followed by an "m", the method fails to return the index of the soft hyphen but instead returns the index of the "m" when it performs a culture-sensitive comparison. 只有当此方法执行序号比较时，它才会在第一个字符串中返回软连字符的索引。The method returns the index of the soft hyphen in the first string only when it performs an ordinal comparison.
[!code-csharp[System.Globalization.CompareInfo.IndexOf#16](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.CompareInfo.IndexOf/CS/ignorable15.cs#16)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.CompareInfo.IndexOf#16](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.CompareInfo.IndexOf/VB/ignorable15.vb#16)]

字符集包括可忽略字符，在执行语言性的或区分区域性的排序时不被考虑的字符。Character sets include ignorable characters, which are characters that are not considered when performing a linguistic or culture-sensitive sort. 在区分区域性的搜索中，如果是可忽略字符，结果等效于搜索移除了该字符。In a culture-sensitive search, if is an ignorable character, the result is equivalent to searching with that character removed. 在这种情况下，方法始终返回中的最后一个索引位置以指示，在末尾找到的匹配。In this case, the method always returns the last index position in to indicate that the match is found at the end of . 在下面的示例中，方法用于在两个字符串中查找该软连字符 (U + 00AD)。In the following example, the method is used to find the soft hyphen (U+00AD) in two strings. 只有一个字符串包含软连字符。Only one of the strings contains a soft hyphen. 在这两种情况下，因为软连字符是一个可忽略字符，该方法将返回以指示它已找到字符串的末尾匹配的字符串中的最后一个索引位置。In both cases, because the soft hyphen is an ignorable character, the method returns the last index position in the string to indicate that it has found a match at the end of the string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 向后从字符串末尾处开始和结束时间字符串的开头，将搜索源字符串。The source string is searched backward starting at the end of the string and ending at the beginning of the string. 此重载执行区分区域性的搜索。This overload performs a culture-sensitive search. 表示一个复合的字符，例如连字"Æ"(U + 00 C 6) 的 Unicode 值可能被视为等效于任何形式的字符中的组件正确的顺序，如"遍历"(U + 0041、 U + 0045)，则根据区域性。A Unicode value representing a precomposed character, such as the ligature "Æ" (U+00C6), might be considered equivalent to any occurrence of the character's components in the correct sequence, such as "AE" (U+0041, U+0045), depending on the culture. 若要执行序号 （不区分区域性的） 搜索，其中的 Unicode 值进行比较，你应具有的类型参数的重载之一调用并用值。To perform an ordinal (culture-insensitive) search, where the Unicode values are compared, you should call one of the overloads that has a parameter of type and use the value. > [!NOTE] > 如果可能，你应调用字符串比较方法具有类型参数的可以指定比较预期的类型。When possible, you should call string comparison methods that have a parameter of type to specify the kind of comparison expected. 作为一般规则，用来进行比较的用户界面中显示的字符串 （使用当前区域性） 的语言选项并指定或安全比较。As a general rule, use linguistic options (using the current culture) for comparing strings displayed in the user interface and specify or for security comparisons. ## Examples 下面的示例确定一个字符或字符串内的子字符串的第一个和最后一个匹配项的索引。The following example determines the indexes of the first and last occurrences of a character or a substring within a string. remarks.format: ## Remarks 源字符串是搜索向后开始`startIndex`和结束时间字符串的开头。The source string is searched backward starting at `startIndex` and ending at the beginning of the string. 值不是此方法有效。The value is not valid for this method. 如果`options`不包括值，此重载执行区分区域性的搜索。If `options` does not include the value, this overload performs a culture-sensitive search. 表示一个复合的字符，例如连字"Æ"(U + 00 C 6) 的 Unicode 值可能被视为等效于任何形式的字符中的组件正确的顺序，如"遍历"(U + 0041、 U + 0045)，则根据区域性。A Unicode value representing a precomposed character, such as the ligature "Æ" (U+00C6), might be considered equivalent to any occurrence of the character's components in the correct sequence, such as "AE" (U+0041, U+0045), depending on the culture. 如果`options`包括值，此重载执行序号 （不区分区域性的） 搜索，其中的 Unicode 值进行比较。If `options` includes the value, this overload performs an ordinal (culture-insensitive) search, where the Unicode values are compared. > [!NOTE] > 如果可能，你应调用字符串比较方法具有类型参数的可以指定比较预期的类型。When possible, you should call string comparison methods that have a parameter of type to specify the kind of comparison expected. 作为一般规则，用来进行比较的用户界面中显示的字符串 （使用当前区域性） 的语言选项并指定或安全比较。As a general rule, use linguistic options (using the current culture) for comparing strings displayed in the user interface and specify or for security comparisons. ## Examples 下面的示例确定一个字符或字符串的一部分内的子字符串的第一个和最后一个匹配项的索引。The following example determines the indexes of the first and last occurrences of a character or a substring within a portion of a string. 请注意，和要搜索的字符串，即使使用相同的不同部分`startIndex`参数。Note that and are searching in different portions of the string, even with the same `startIndex` parameter. block.para:
字符集包括可忽略字符，在执行语言性的或区分区域性的排序时不被考虑的字符。Character sets include ignorable characters, which are characters that are not considered when performing a linguistic or culture-sensitive sort. 在区分区域性的搜索 (即，如果 不是 或 ) 中，如果 包含一个可忽略字符，则结果与移除了该字符的搜索等效。In a culture-sensitive search (that is, if is not or ), if contains an ignorable character, the result is equivalent to searching with that character removed. 如果仅由一个或多个可忽略字符，组成方法始终返回，即开始执行搜索的字符位置。If consists only of one or more ignorable characters, the method always returns , which is the character position at which the search begins.
在下面的示例中，方法用于查找软连字符 (U + 00AD) 后跟"m"，两个字符串中的最后"m"开头的位置。In the following example, the method is used to find the position of a soft hyphen (U+00AD) followed by an "m", starting with the final "m" in two strings. 只有一个字符串包含必需的子字符串。Only one of the strings contains the required substring. 在这两种情况下，因为软连字符是可忽略字符，因此，在执行区分区域性的比较时，该方法在字符串中返回索引“m”。In both cases, because the soft hyphen is an ignorable character, the method returns the index of "m" in the string when it performs a culture-sensitive comparison. 注意对于第一个字符串，包含软连字符后跟“m”，该方法无法返回该软连字符的索引，而是返回“m”的索引。Note that in the case of the first string, which includes the soft hyphen followed by an "m", the method fails to return the index of the soft hyphen but instead returns the index of the "m". 只有当此方法执行序号比较时，它才会在第一个字符串中返回软连字符的索引。The method returns the index of the soft hyphen in the first string only when it performs an ordinal comparison.

字符集包括可忽略字符，在执行语言性的或区分区域性的排序时不被考虑的字符。Character sets include ignorable characters, which are characters that are not considered when performing a linguistic or culture-sensitive sort. 在区分区域性的搜索 (即，如果 不是 或 ) 中，如果 包含一个可忽略字符，则结果与移除了该字符的搜索等效。In a culture-sensitive search (that is, if is not or ), if contains an ignorable character, the result is equivalent to searching with that character removed. 如果仅由一个或多个可忽略字符，组成方法始终返回，即开始执行搜索的字符位置。If consists only of one or more ignorable characters, the method always returns , which is the character position at which the search begins.
在下面的示例中，方法用于在两个字符串中查找跟"m"，在所有软连字符 (U + 00AD) 的位置，但之前的最后"m"的第一个字符位置。In the following example, the method is used to find the position of a soft hyphen (U+00AD) followed by an "m" in all but the first character position before the final "m" in two strings. 只有一个字符串包含必需的子字符串。Only one of the strings contains the required substring. 在这两种情况下，因为软连字符是可忽略字符，因此，在执行区分区域性的比较时，该方法在字符串中返回索引“m”。In both cases, because the soft hyphen is an ignorable character, the method returns the index of "m" in the string when it performs a culture-sensitive comparison. 当它执行序号比较时，但是，它会查找子字符串仅在第一个字符串中。When it performs an ordinal comparison, however, it finds the substring only in the first string. 请注意，对于第一个字符串，包含软连字符后跟"m"，该方法无法返回该软连字符的索引，但执行区分区域性的比较时，而是返回"m"的索引。Note that in the case of the first string, which includes the soft hyphen followed by an "m", the method fails to return the index of the soft hyphen but instead returns the index of the "m" when it performs a culture-sensitive comparison. 只有当此方法执行序号比较时，它才会在第一个字符串中返回软连字符的索引。The method returns the index of the soft hyphen in the first string only when it performs an ordinal comparison.
[!code-vb[System.Globalization.CompareInfo.LastIndexOf#16](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.compareinfo.lastindexof/vb/lastignorable15.vb#16)]

summary.span: 获取用于通过 对象执行排序操作的区域性的名称。

span.span: Gets the name of the culture used for sorting operations by this object.
The name of a culture.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 和属性可以具有不同的值。The and properties can have different values. 例如，属性值的十六进制 0x10407 标识对名称进行排序，因为它们可能会显示德语电话书中的替换排序区域性。For example, an property value of hexadecimal 0x10407 identifies an alternate sort culture that sorts names as they might appear in a German telephone book. 属性具有值为"de-de_phoneb"，而属性关联的德语 （德国） 区域性的具有"DE-DE"的值。The property has a value of "de-de_phoneb", whereas the property of the associated German (Germany) culture has a value of "de-DE". ## Examples 下面的示例将三个使用 FR-FR 和 JA-JP 区域性的字符串进行比较。The following example compares three strings using the fr-FR and ja-JP cultures. 属性用来显示每个区域性的名称。The property is used to display the name of each culture. [!code-cpp[CompareInfo#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CompareInfo/cpp/CompareInfo.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[CompareInfo#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CompareInfo/CS/CompareInfo.cs#1)] [!code-vb[CompareInfo#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/CompareInfo/VB/CompareInfo.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将替代方法。This method overrides the method. 它将返回类名称和实例的值组成的字符串属性，以连字符分隔。It returns a string that consists of the class name and the value of the instance property, separated by a hyphen.

para.span: 从 .NET Framework 4 开始， 方法返回类名，后跟空格、连字符、空格和 属性的值。

span.span: Staring with the .NET Framework 4, the method returns the class name followed by a space, a hyphen, a space, and the value of the property.

para.span: 例如，对于表示 en-US 区域性的 对象， 方法返回“CompareInfo - en-US”。

span.span: For example, for a object that represents the en-US culture, the method returns "CompareInfo - en-US".

para.span: 在 .NET Framework 的早期版本中，它返回后跟空格、连字符、空格和 属性的值的类名。

span.span: In previous versions of the .NET Framework, it returns the class name followed by a space, a hyphen, a space, and the value of the property.

para.span: 例如，对于表示 en-US 区域性的 对象， 方法返回“CompareInfo - 1033”。

summary.span: 获取用于比较和排序字符串的 Unicode 版本的相关信息。

span.span: Gets information about the version of Unicode used for comparing and sorting strings.

value.span: 包含用于比较和排序字符串的 Unicode 版本的相关信息的对象。

span.span: An object that contains information about the Unicode version used for comparing and sorting strings.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每个字符的权重，因此中比较或排序，特定字符串的方式取决于特定版本的.NET framework 实现 Unicode 规范的版本。The weight of individual characters, and therefore the way in which particular strings are compared or ordered, depends on the version of the Unicode specification that a particular version of the .NET Framework implements. 在 [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)] 中，这也取决于主机操作系统，如下表所示。In the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)], this also depends on the host operating system, as the following table shows. 请注意，受支持的 Unicode 版本的列表仅适用于字符比较和排序；不适用于 Unicode 字符串按类别分类。Note that this list of supported Unicode versions applies to character comparison and sorting only; it does not apply to classification of Unicode characters by category. |.NET Framework 版本.NET Framework version|操作系统Operating system|Unicode 版本Unicode version| |----------------------------|----------------------|---------------------| |[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]|所有操作系统All operating systems|Unicode 5.0Unicode 5.0| |[!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)] 和更高版本 and later versions|[!INCLUDE[win7](~/includes/win7-md.md)]|Unicode 5.0Unicode 5.0| |[!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)] 和更高版本 and later versions|[!INCLUDE[win8](~/includes/win8-md.md)] 和更高版本的 Windows 操作系统版本 and later Windows operating system versions|Unicode 6.3Unicode 6.3| 由 属性返回的 对象不标识用于比较字符串的准确 Unicode 版本。The object returned by the property doesn't identify the precise Unicode version used to compare strings. 仅在比较两个 对象来确定它们是否使用相同版本的 Unicode 版本和区域性来比较字符串时很有用。It is useful only when comparing two objects to determine whether they use the same Unicode version and culture to compare strings. 有关详细信息和示例，请参见 引用页。For more information and an example, see the reference page.
